Title: Hungary aims to start importing Azeri pipeline gas this year
Description: Hungary aims to start importing pipeline gas from Azerbaijan this year and for the long term, to strengthen its energy security. This could limit Hungary’s demand for LNG.
Author: DE

Title: Gail seeks March-May LNG cargoes; EGAS offers one March LNG cargo from Damietta
Description: India’s state-owned Gail has issued a tender each to buy three LNG cargoes for delivery between March any May to the 5 mtpa Dabhol LNG receiving terminal in India, while Egypt’s state-owned EGAS has added to spot supply advailability with its offer of a cargo loading on Mar. 6-7 at the 5 mtpa Damietta LNG receiving terminal. Both tenders close tomorrow.
Author: CK
